summary: Provides a mock implementation of the Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (EKS) API, defining data models for clusters, managed node groups, and Fargate profiles, and a backend that handles creation, retrieval, update, deletion, and tagging of these resources with validation and pagination support.
business_intent: Enable developers to test and develop applications that interact with AWS EKS without accessing real AWS infrastructure by simulating EKS resource lifecycle and behavior.
